title: Chief Bailout Negotiator: Greece Needs An 'Economically Sustainable' Deal
teaser: NPR's Rachel Martin talks with Euclid Tsakalatos, Greece's deputy foreign minister and chief negotiator in the bailout talks, about Sunday's referendum and what yes and no votes would mean.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
